articles.title: Some small businesses could increase PPP loan size under new Senate bill - Fox Business
articles.description: A bipartisan group of senators unveiled a proposal this week to allow the nation's smallest businesses to receive additional aid through the Paycheck Protection Program, a key coronavirus rescue fund that's poised to expire at the end of May.
